佈.definition: variant of 布[bu4]; to announce; to spread

佈告.definition: posting on a bulletin board; notice; bulletin; to announce

佈建.definition: to progressively extend (service delivery, network etc) to a wider area; rollout

佈置.definition: to put in order; to arrange; to decorate; to fix up; to deploy

佈道.definition: sermon; to sermonize; to preach; to evangelize
